name: senatorial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a senate (= one of the two groups of politicians who make laws in some countries) or to a senator (= a member of a senate): a senatorial candidate/committee After losing a vicious senatorial campaign, he became a publishing executive in New York City. His record looked too senatorial at a time when the country wanted a commander in chief. See
senator
More examplesFewer examplesThe party can't find a decent senatorial candidate.A unified party is an absolute must if we are to win November's senatorial race.They contributed $10,000 each to the Democratic senatorial and congressional committees.He phoned each of his senatorial clients every day.
